title: Innovative Science Curriculum Design Using Collaborative Teaching Methodologies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level theoretical knowledge and practical experience in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Emphasis on a collaborative learning environment with high work relevance for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can propose at least three science education content design processes through collaborative activities
Learners can develop and present at least two innovative instructional models applicable to real science education settings
Learners can complete science curriculum improvement projects with over 80% completion rate through collaboration with diverse stakeholders
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
